name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a skilled **Senior Webflow Engineer** with 8 years of experience, I excel in creating responsive designs and implementing web integrations utilizing **JavaScript**, **Svelte**, and **Webflow**. My proficiency in **Figma** ensures seamless design-to-development transitions, while my strong understanding of SEO practices helps deliver optimized web solutions. I possess a keen eye for **animations** and **microinteractions**, enhancing user experience and engagement.
I have a solid background in full-stack development, applying modern tools like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js** to build high-performance solutions, particularly in healthcare and financial sectors. My cloud knowledge with **Azure** and **AWS** enhances my ability to create scalable applications. Strong analytical skills enable me to leverage data insights effectively, ensuring that all projects align with industry best practices and standards.
